name: Last Sniper Survivor Zombie
description:
The Dead have risen, you are the last person alive in your group, you have to kill those dead before they get you.
You will have to endure alive in a town with very limited vision cause the fog.
The only between you and a horrible dead is your powerful rifle and you sniper skills.

Last Sniper Survivor Z is the new sniper hunting game inspired on Zombie concept, if you love Walking dead, George Romero Movies, Resident evil games you will have a great time shooting some undead ghouls.
Disgusting zombies, creepy atmosphere and disturbing sounds will guarantee a bloody adventure.

HOW TO PLAY:
You can adjust the sensitivy in the pause screen
Use Your right thumb to aim and then the fire button .
Also you can help yourself making a quick turn to rotate 180 degrees.
